name: Audrey for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Audrey is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Copenhagen, Denmark, Audrey was a very brisk girl and was not afraid to defend her interests. It happened in fourth grade, and Audrey was in this class with all these kids.

Here’s the back story: Her parents usually pack her fruit for a snack, but on this day they packed her like half of the leftover Pringles from the day before, you know, in that cylinder container. Audrey was really excited since SHE LOVES PRINGLES. But when recess came around so she could take her Pringles and go eat it outside, they weren’t in her bag. Audrey started scoping the area, trying to find her Pringles. She call the teacher, she tries to find them but she can’t either. Than this thought comes to Audrey's mind—What if MOIRA STOLE IT?

Moira was this chubby girl in her class that literally ALWAYS wore this purple princess dress that should be classified as a bad Halloween costume (seriously) and was known for being a bitch.

Being the judgmental 9-10 year old Audrey was, she straight out concluded that Moira must’ve stolen her damn Pringles. Audrey just tell her teacher, “Well too bad, I’ll just go out for recess now. It was just PRINGLES.” Being a little angel. So Audrey stomp out of the class and start searching for Moira. So after a solid 10 minutes, she find a group of these kids crowded at the side of one of the portable classrooms. Audrey rush over to see what it is. The kids were eating Pringles. Barbecue flavored Pringles. HER PRINGLES. Audrey start raging as she smack the Pringles out of the kids’ hands and start ripping people away from the main source. And in the middle of all the kids, sat a smug looking MOIRA with her PRINGLES. Audrey look all mad and rip the BLOODY EMPTY CONTAINER OF PRINGLES OUT OF THE DAMN BITCH’S FILTHY HANDS. By now even dumb-ass Moira knows what’s up, she’s a goner. Audrey would’s murdered her at the very least, but a supervisor saw them and ran over.

Moira was forced to apologize and Audrey was forced to accept her damn apology, but since that time she understood that she will never let anybody to take her things. And she is ready to fight for her place on the street.

Help Audrey to take her place on the street!

short_description: Audrey is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
